label: Attestation
comment: A conformity attestation issued by a competent body that defines one or more assessments (eg carbon intensity) about a product (eg batttery) against a specification (eg LCA method) defined in a standard or regulation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The accreditation from a competent authority (ag NATA) that confirms the issuers authorised scope of assessments.
Assurance pertaining to assessment (any authority or support for the assessment process)
Assurance code pertaining to assessor (relation to the object under assessment)
A textual description of the scope or purpose of this confomrity attestation
The type of criterion (optional or mandatory).
Auditable evidence supporting this assessment such as raw measurements, supporting documents. This is usally private data and would normally be encrypted.

A reference to the human / printable version of this conformity attestation - typically represented as a PDF document. The document may have more details than are represented in the digital attestation.
A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the product passport. May be a UUID
The party to whom the conformity attestation was issued.
